content: Graduated from high school in Mumbai, India.
Interned for AnalyticsDomain doing web development.
Started interning as an analyst intern at *ZS Associates* in Pune.
Graduated from college with a Bachelor's degree in Computer Science.
Started a full-time Data Engineer position in *ZS Associates* in Pune.
Promoted to Senior Data Enginner at *ZS Associates*.
Got accepted in *Stony Brook University* in New York, United States.
Joined *Stony Brook University* as a Master's student majoring in Computer Science.
